data.title: Good Chicken
data.text: I decided to give this place a try. I had a taste for fried chicken. Ordered white meat chicken (breast and wing). Well breaded and tasty. Along with the chicken I ordered corn on cob and fried okra. Again, everything was good. Will recommend to my friends.

data.title: Had taste for chicken
data.text: Great chicken for the money. Had special 5 pieces of dark meat for $5.00. I also ordered 2 piece white meat chicken. They offer regular or spicy flavor. I also ordered side of macaroni and cheese and biscuits. All were very good. I recommend this place. The chicken breast was too small for the price.

data.title: good value for the dollar
data.text: large pieces of nicely done chicken, with lot's of sides to choose from, like salads and fries
